website_summaries.verdict: Strong soundbar system that'll deliver an excellent quality of sound in hardware that looks good.
pros: Can deliver the sound quality that you want to have with 4K video
Sound bar hardware is slim and will look good displayed in your living room
Creates excellent sound throughout the audio range
May add more wireless speakers later to the system
cons: Quality of wireless connection may drop unexpectedly

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, exceptional packing
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, I have been using it for 2 months without an issue. Connection with Sony TV was easy, blue tooth connection with apple products is excellent. Sound quality is good for movies, reasonable for music. It does produce deep heavy low frequency sounds, but good for average listener like me. Seller mailed it in a large box, with exceptionally good parking. It took more time to get it out of box than to set it up and start enjoying. Well done.
customer_reviews.author: Tarvinder

customer_reviews.title: Subwoofer won't hit low notes properly.
customer_reviews.text: So far am disappointed in the subwoofer quality it seems to try and hit frequencies that are to low for it I am guessing around 30hertz. When it attempted these long base notes it seems to sound like a flag flapping in the wind going to give it a few days to break in will update if there is any improvement. So far for $600 it's not worth it at all would look for higher quality for the price. Turn on the weekend the hills and listen to the lowest base note in the sequence to know what I am talking about.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: like going to the theatre
customer_reviews.text: the sound and special effects are like going to the movies my wife call our living room the theatre worth every penny i paid for it buy it and enjoy
customer_reviews.author: coasterfreak1

customer_reviews.title: Music sounds amazing on this
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from an older LG sound bar. Music sounds amazing on this. Subwoofer delivers plenty of bass. Simulated surround works well too. Thinking about the wireless rears in the future when they come down in price.
customer_reviews.author: tripjack

customer_reviews.title: Very nice sound bar
customer_reviews.text: Great product with very good sound. Only wish was that connection to srszr5 surround speakers did not require re-connection when switching from stereo to surround movie mode. Usually use app instead of the sound bar's menu to reestablish the surround.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love mine, but a few small issues.
customer_reviews.text: Love mine! I have two small issues with it, one that it goes back to the USB input once you leave the TV/ARC mode. And you can't change the default input to something like HDMI1 or TV. The second small issue is that the OSD does not show when playing 4k content, it only displays on 1080p content. I think this can probably be fixed easily with a firmware update.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff M

customer_reviews.title: Need to unplug daily to reset it, just to get it to work.
customer_reviews.text: Need to unplug and reset daily. Just stops working until unplugged and reset... Extremely disappointed with this, especially for the amount of money it costs.
customer_reviews.author: cRaShFl

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: The sound is great, it's like being at the movies!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara W.

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Probably not the best option if you are serious about home theater sound. But this can't be beat for ease of setup. Good volume, handles movie soundtracks well, but not a great choice for music. Looks great with my wall mounted 55" Sony too.
customer_reviews.author: RustyDred

customer_reviews.title: ... buying it at our local electronic store and it's amazing! Really great
customer_reviews.text: Sadly my speaker never got to me as my package went MIA but I ended up buying it at our local electronic store and it's amazing! Really great, but the down fall to it is sometimes the subwoofer doesn't work and you have to unplug it and plug it back in for it to work! Other than that the sound comes out amazing! And the music bumps when I have family gatherings! It's wall mounted under a 55" Sony tv!
customer_reviews.author: Cristian S Castro

customer_reviews.title: First one was super quiet at max volume
customer_reviews.text: Tons of problems. First one was super quiet at max volume. Second one goes silent requiring you to unplug it and plug it back in every couple of days.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor S. Havens

customer_reviews.title: Beware...
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for 2 months...hasn't worked since....Randomly stops working....Won't stop on any input other than M Serv....If I am lucky enough to get it working now it may last for a half hour..... I have an older Sony bar that works flawlessly......bought this for my mom for Christmas last year....complete opposite experience.
customer_reviews.author: Gene albrecht

customer_reviews.title: It works great with my Sony tv
customer_reviews.text: It works great with my Sony tv. Love this product especially the subwoofer comes to life when you crank up the volume on the spun at.
customer_reviews.author: James d.

customer_reviews.title: WARNING, guaranteed headache and/or fist in wall.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 12/2016. So far I had to send it in for repair twice due to, no connectivity to 5 ghz internet, Overly long start up time, boot up freezes, not connecting to subwoofer, and sluggish performance. Now I'm re-experiencing the long boot up time 7 minutes to get sound to work. Save yourself the trouble and avoid this. Customer support is good, but the product is just bad. I have buyers remorse.
customer_reviews.author: Bluyt

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I would love to give this item 5 stars but its not even a year and I stopped using it a few months ago due to it being too slow. When powering on, it stays stuck on "Please wait" for about 10 minutes and then about another 5 mintues when you try to switch sources. And powering off is just as bad! About 5-10 minutes just to turn off. I loved this item in the beginning but now I am just very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Setup was okay, the settings screen is a bit inconvienant/not modern compared to some of the newer stuff out there. Aside from that, our playbar worked for 6 months and then took a crap just as most of the reviews said. My fault for not listening to everyone. It worked great and then all of the sudden stopped in the middle of watching a show and it wasn’t even loud. Speaker isn’t blown out, it’s just an internal part failure. I ordered a Sonos playbar instead! WAY WORTH the money... sonos all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Sara M.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound! A little fiddly with certain inputs (Xbox ...
customer_reviews.text: Great sound! A little fiddly with certain inputs (Xbox One), so connected this directly to the TV instead, but it works great with the PS4. Works well as a Bluetooth speaker and being able to connect to it with Bluetooth headphones is really cool. Pair with a Bravia TV for maximum win.
customer_reviews.author: Paulo Fierro

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, cool look, easy operation, suit w/Sony TV very well.
customer_reviews.author: Minoru N.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT SPEND YOUR MONEY ON THIS SOUNDBAR!
customer_reviews.text: 4k hi res sound quality my butt! The 4k only supported for this ygb and not rgb....ygb can only go up to 30hz/fps. Buy you all selves a 1080 soundbar, 4k sound bars are not worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Good Product.  Easy Connectivity.
customer_reviews.text: The product works fine and was delivered on time. My only complaint is that at this price, surround sound speakers should have been included.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca S. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Ahhh this beat bar rocks the house! Pay attention ...
customer_reviews.text: Ahhh this beat bar rocks the house! Pay attention to directions, but once wired up it wasn't to difficult of an install.
customer_reviews.author: Georgene Fix

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Broken twice in six months, same problem both times -- UI slowed down to become completely unresponsive.
customer_reviews.author: J.D. Gilles-Mehetabel

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that it did not come with the Optical Audio Cable that I needed
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: terrible product. sound was ok but matrix meaning you ...
customer_reviews.text: terrible product. sound was ok but matrix meaning you dont get 5.1. just fake surround. also has the worst software i ever seen. slow as heck and got worse each day. couldn't even get to settings after a few days
customer_reviews.author: harvey emmons

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: sent back to sony 4 times in 6 months. Save your money and your headaches
customer_reviews.author: denis suedkamp

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised please read review to understand. Software update required plus once updated Sub Woofer won't work.
customer_reviews.text: Was working fine. But the unit comes with writing on the box that will not support multiple speakers as advertised because the software will need updating. Funny enough the update came through last night to support the additional speakers but the new update disabled the sub woofer. After 2 hours with tech support Sony advised us to return the item.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Beach Camera sux.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product for about 2 and a half months and I'm already having issues with it. Beach Camera is no help at all. They have washed their hands and told me to call Sony. It turns on but no sound. I've tried everything. I am sure I have connected it correctly. ARC to ARC HDMI connection. The menu button does not work nor does the input button. The volume numbers go up and down strangely but no sound. Watch out for Beach Camera. I think they sold me a floor model for full price. I can't prove it but the way it was packed in the box seemed fishy.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Soundbar never worked correctly
customer_reviews.text: Bought this soundbar at the premium price of $599(not through Amazon) and thinking about it...thing never worked. Bought for Xmas 2016 and in a few months time it'd freeze on please wait. Took it in for repairs and it took 3 months for the part to arrive. Picked it up at repair center Jan. 2018 and it worked fine for about three months and then it went to please wait land again. I found an internet seller that sells the part but it costs $180. Gave up and gave in, threw it out! Save your money and don't buy Sony soundbars. Failure rates for this and a couple more Sony models are unusually high(searched it on internet).
customer_reviews.author: JoFi

customer_reviews.title: The sound from music played from my phone via bluetooth was awesome, but when I tried watching DVD's the soundbar ...
customer_reviews.text: Initially I wasn't very thrilled with my purchase of this soundbar. The sound from music played from my phone via bluetooth was awesome, but when I tried watching DVD's the soundbar was really quiet overall. I also found myself turning it up during speaking, and down during sound effects and music which was annoying to go back and forth, in addition to there being a slight lag between the audio and visual. After going through the owner's manual and tweaking the settings however, I am 100% satisfied. The owner's manual will walk you through adjusting the settings if you run into any of the issues that I did.
customer_reviews.author: Joe A.

customer_reviews.title: Buy literally anything else.
customer_reviews.text: This is just another in a long line of Sony's deteriorating quality. It's a piece of garbage, honestly. Things just stop working all of a sudden. Some inputs work, some don't. It's only responsive to the remote when it wants to be. And the sound is horrible, which is likely why you're buying this thing. Seriously, don't.
customer_reviews.author: Mark G.

customer_reviews.title: Blown Away!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing sound that bounces all over, placement is key. Having 3 HDMI'S and a HDMI Arc is PERFECT. I have it hooked up to my LG OLED and sync is perfect as well as being able to control the volume from my TV remote, Roku remote and Xbox.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Thorn

customer_reviews.title: Stay away, unless you like wall decorations.
customer_reviews.text: Like everyone else who has had this unit, it will eventually apply an update and cause the device to be rendered useless. It will sit in the please wait status and not allow you to select an input. Unfortunately, you will have to send this back to sony for repairs. You will be without the unit for at least a month while waiting on repairs. The sound was great on the bar, but not worth the money when you have these kinds of problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sound Bust!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on December 29, 2016. On March 18, 2017 it stopped working. The video display on the sound bar would only scroll "Please Wait" continuously. All remote buttons were unresponsive. The touch buttons on the front of the sound bar were unresponsive. I followed all the trouble shooting instructions and then reached out to Sony. They then proceeded to walk me through the exact same steps all over again only to then finally agree with me, the unit has problems. I now have to mail this thing in for repairs. Estimated turn around time, 9 weeks!!
customer_reviews.author: RLHNTX

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't even recommend at discounted price
customer_reviews.text: The only thing this sound bar has going for it is the number of hdmi inputs. The lows and mids are handled beyond poorly for such a steep price. The soundstage is thin and weak, everything sounds tinny. This is regardless of volume or soundstage selected. Dont even get me started on the subwoofer and how poorly its integrated with the bars sound output. At the end of the day, there are plenty of 150-300$ soundbars that can outperform this sony, even at it's best. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Weinberg

customer_reviews.title: Very good soundbar, but volume with Netflix is low...?!?
customer_reviews.text: I have installed the NT5 couple days ago together with Sony 93D 55" 4K/HDR. The setup was flawlessly quick, the sound quality is much better than I expected from a thin soundbar. The bass can be a bit low sometime depends on which movies/audio you are watching or listening to. The only major problem I had was with Netflix streaming where the audio volume is SO low that I have to max out sometime, is this something everyone is experiencing ? I will have a pair of SRS-SR5 coming tomorrow and I can't wait to plug them in for a surround experience...:) .... I will post a review here once it is done ...
customer_reviews.author: NGUYEN ANH NGUYEN

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine till about 9 months then started not recognizing directTv input then sent for repair. After repairing worked until the warranty ran out. Right now it doesn’t sync with Sony Bravia tv. So can’t use tv remote for volume control. Also with tv apps no sound output from sound bar. Very disappointing as I’m still paying for this brick.
customer_reviews.author: liyanaer

customer_reviews.title: Audio video sync absolutely sucks. I spend usually about 5-10 minutes trying to ...
customer_reviews.text: Audio video sync absolutely sucks. I spend usually about 5-10 minutes trying to sync up the voices coming out of the soundbar, to the actors voicing the dialogue on the screen. It usually comes close.....but its always a little off and takes you right out of the immersement of the show. Go with a receiver instead. I regret choosing a soundbar for tv and will probably end up using it in the kitchen strictly for music. I took me awhile to pick up on the audio sync issues.....it's not immediately apparent.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Valentine

customer_reviews.title: ... be the most time consuming and frustrating piece of garbage I've ever invested my time and money in (and ...
customer_reviews.text: This might be the most time consuming and frustrating piece of garbage I've ever invested my time and money in (and I say that coming off a divorce). When it works, which is rare, the volume balance between the tweets and sub are very off and you have zero control. I guess the system sensed my frustration and now the sub has dropped out all together. Zero customer support. Best Buy says call Sony, Sony says call Best Buy. Last Sony product I'll ever buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best sound bar I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: This sound bar is amazing! The front firing tweeters really help you hear the dialog while watching a movie. sub is nice too. The remote is very helpful with a seperate volume for the bar and the sub.
customer_reviews.author: Seb311

customer_reviews.title: Sony should be ashamed. The product can not keep ...
customer_reviews.text: Sony should be ashamed. The product can not keep connectivity with its satelite speakers, and now, the soundbar won't play sound at all. It won't even turn off. I am definitely second guessing buying Sony products ever again. I expect more for the money we spent.
customer_reviews.author: Dazia Bosworth

customer_reviews.title: Stops working. Please Wait.....
customer_reviews.text: Stops working after 6 months. Already had one repair done and stopped working again. You can see I am not the only one from the other reviews. Also purchased rear speakers so now I am out about 1,500 dollars. Sony won’t help.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Sounds awesome !
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is amazing! The set up from start to finish took less than an hour, and we were streaming music.
customer_reviews.author: Live Laugh Love More

customer_reviews.title: Truthfully one of the worst products I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Truthfully one of the worst products I've ever owned! After spending way too much money on two wireless speakers too create a wireless 5.1 system, had the sound bar go into a an endless loop and stop functioning. Tried every trick in the book including various online tutorials on how to hard reset and update the sound bar to no avail, truthfully a waste of money and because it's out of warranty and sony just doesn't care a horrible paper weight. (Save your money for any other sound bar)
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I know this is not a high-end soundbar, but honestly the sound is mediocre. There's absolutely no midrange whatsoever. Its decently loud (it is *definitely* not 400w as its specs say) for a small room, but I was expecting a much higher quality sound. There's no warmth to the sound. Very disappointed. I'm returning the unit.
customer_reviews.author: FrankG

customer_reviews.title: Bought this product at Best Buy. The sound is not much better that ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product at Best Buy. The sound is not much better that the TV. Hard to hook up and operate. Sound would shut off periodically. Poor investment.
customer_reviews.author: K-JAM

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal sound. Tremendous value.
customer_reviews.text: This soundbar is special. Sound quality competes with very high end soundbars with much higher price points. I'm lookin at you Sonos and Bose! 3 HDMI in and 1 HDMI ARC out is an excellent feature. Hi-RES audio, wireless multi room and Bluetooth/NFC capability are all awesome too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Sony HTNT5 Sound Bar with Hi-Res Audio and Wireless Streaming
product_meta.description: The ultimate Hi-Res sound bar for your 4K home theater experience. The NT5 packs power and performance worthy of any home theater into a sleek, beautiful design. Experience the sonic details of every movie, playlist, and videogame thanks to the clarity of Super Tweeters and support for Hi-Res Audio playback.. And connect your compatible device wirelessly to stream music from all your favorite services. Input Output Terminals: Optical Input, Analog Input, USB, Ethernet
feature_bullets: Experience rich, Hi-Res sound in a stylish design, Maintain 4K quality with HDCP2.2 and HDR support, Dolby TrueHD & DTS-HD Master Audio format support
Easily add wireless surround sound speakers, Enjoy wireless multi-room listening, Get connected with 3 HDMI inputs, HDMI ARC and more
Play music wirelessly via Bluetooth, Hi-Res Audio playback via USB
In the box: HDMI Cable, Wall Hanging Bracket, Punching Grill support hook, Batteries, Warranty Card, Quick Setup Guide, Instruction Manual, Remote Control (RMT-AH240U)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars90 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
